# bigint


```
$ gcc -std=gnu99 -Wall -O3 -o program_c program.c -lgmp

$ make run1
./program_c

# D with std.bigint
# $ make c3 # not works because with -betterC
$ ldc2 -mtriple=x86_64-linux-gnu -w -O -static -of=program_d program.d

$ make run3
./program_d

$ make run3

./program_d
```
